Package controllers

Class StockStatusReportController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
controllers.StockStatusReportController
public class StockStatusReportController extends AbstractController
StockStatusReportController is the controller for handling stock status reports. It extends AbstractController and overrides methods of it.
